contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 25 th day of June, 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Order of the Superi- or Court is VACATED. This matter is REMANDED to the trial court for an evidentiary hearing pursuant to this Court’s decision in Commonwealth v. Anders, 725 A.2d 170 (Pa.1999).
